description: Modifies the self-service WorkSpace management capabilities for your users. For more information, see Enable Self-Service WorkSpace Management Capabilities for Your Users.

parameters.name: SelfservicePermissions
parameters.description: The permissions to enable or disable self-service capabilities. RestartWorkspace (string) --- Specifies whether users can restart their WorkSpace. IncreaseVolumeSize (string) --- Specifies whether users can increase the volume size of the drives on their WorkSpace. ChangeComputeType (string) --- Specifies whether users can change the compute type (bundle) for their WorkSpace. SwitchRunningMode (string) --- Specifies whether users can switch the running mode of their WorkSpace. RebuildWorkspace (string) --- Specifies whether users can rebuild the operating system of a WorkSpace to its original state.

nested_params.name: RestartWorkspace
nested_params.description: Specifies whether users can restart their WorkSpace.

nested_params.name: IncreaseVolumeSize
nested_params.description: Specifies whether users can increase the volume size of the drives on their WorkSpace.

nested_params.name: ChangeComputeType
nested_params.description: Specifies whether users can change the compute type (bundle) for their WorkSpace.

nested_params.name: SwitchRunningMode
nested_params.description: Specifies whether users can switch the running mode of their WorkSpace.

nested_params.name: RebuildWorkspace
nested_params.description: Specifies whether users can rebuild the operating system of a WorkSpace to its original state.
